title: Nexus
description: A real-time enterprise collaboration platform built to unify internal communication and workflows.
about: Nexus is a large-scale enterprise platform focused on real-time communication and productivity. The system heavily relies on WebSocket-based architecture to synchronize data across web and desktop clients.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented real-time features using WebSockets
Led frontend architecture for web and Electron-based desktop applications
Built scalable state management for real-time data synchronization
Ensured performance and consistency across platforms
Collaborated closely with backend teams on real-time communication protocols

achievements.title: Faster Turnaround
achievements.description: Projects saw significantly faster completion due to real-time tools.

achievements.title: User Adoption
achievements.description: Achieved across 5 distinct departments in two weeks.

achievements.title: WebSocket Sync
achievements.description: Synchronized data across web and desktop clients.

gallery.label: Desktop Chat – Light Mode
gallery.description: Primary desktop chat interface designed for seamless team communication.

gallery.label: Desktop Chat – Dark Mode
gallery.description: Dark mode variant of the desktop chat, optimized for prolonged usage.

gallery.label: Mobile Overview – Light Mode
gallery.description: Unified mobile dashboard providing quick access to chats, tasks, calendar events, and organizational updates for efficient on-the-go collaboration.

gallery.label: Mobile Overview – Dark Mode
gallery.description: Dark mode mobile overview designed to ensure consistency with the desktop experience while supporting fast navigation and real-time updates.

gallery.label: Mobile Chat – Light Mode
gallery.description: Mobile chat experience tailored for real-time communication, prioritizing performance, readability, and intuitive interaction patterns.

gallery.label: Mobile Chat – Dark Mode
gallery.description: Dark mode mobile chat interface delivering a consistent, focused, and distraction-free messaging experience across devices.

title: LandLogic
description: A geospatial web platform used by Canadian municipalities for land-use planning and permit issuance.
about: Worked on a complex map-based system handling large-scale geospatial data and dynamic reporting.
responsibilities: Implemented Mapbox GL to render over 2,000 geospatial layers
Developed parcel-based dynamic reporting pages
Optimized rendering and state management for large datasets
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment

title: Lastik Foroosh
description: A performance-oriented e-commerce platform focused on SEO and server-side rendering.
about: Responsible for end-to-end frontend development of an e-commerce platform using Next.js with a strong focus on SEO, performance, and maintainability.
responsibilities: Developed the complete frontend architecture independently
Implemented SSR using Next.js to improve SEO and discoverability
Built reusable UI components with Material UI
Optimized Core Web Vitals and page performance

title: Alkafeel HR Platform
description: A modular HR management system built using a micro-frontend architecture.
about: Contributed to an enterprise HR system developed with Vue.js and micro-frontend architecture across multiple teams.
responsibilities: Developed independent micro-frontend modules using Vue.js
Collaborated with three frontend teams on system integration
Implemented RTL-first layouts for Arabic users
Maintained UI consistency across distributed deployments

title: Marine Platform
description: A large-scale web application consolidating internal enterprise workflows.
about: Worked across multiple teams to build and customize complex form-driven workflows.
responsibilities: Customized Alibaba Formily for enterprise-grade forms
Collaborated with cross-functional teams
Helped reduce manual paperwork by approximately 75%

title: Artunity
description: A SEO-focused platform built with SSR capabilities.
about: Focused on frontend development and SEO optimization using React and Next.js.
responsibilities: Developed and deployed 15+ production-ready pages
Migrated critical flows to Next.js with SSR
Doubled user acquisition through SEO improvements
Delivered stable, bug-free releases

title: Jtradehelp
description: An AI-driven platform for analyzing international trade data and discovering cross-border opportunities.
about: Delivered Phase One of a data-intensive Angular application designed to explore global trade data using AI-assisted insights.
responsibilities: Implemented Phase One of the frontend using Angular
Built scalable UI components for trade data analysis
Integrated large datasets into analytical dashboards
Worked closely with product and data teams
